text: qoob jaan rakho ke dunya ki zindagi sirf khel tamaasha, zeenath aur aapas mein faqr (wa ghuroor) aur maal wa aulaad mein ek ka dosre se apne aap ko zyaada batlaana hai, jaise baarish aur us ki paydawaar kisaano ko acchi maloom hoti hai, phir jab wo khushk ho jaati hai to zard rang mein us ko tum dekhte ho, phir wo bilkul chura chura ho jaati hai aur aaqirath mein saqth azaab aur Allah ki maghfirath aur raza mandhi hai, aur dunya ki zindagi bajuz dhuke ke samaan ke aur kuch bhi to nahi
